divs: sighting detailsit happened 6.am watching presidant regan elected second term on tv. open patio door to garden watching airplanes flying over it was still dark. alight came away from its course and heading towards me .it was acloud hovering above me . it made no noise . then all of sudden a search light shone out of the cloud going left toright on the ground. then flew off towards chiswick house. i was in shock and said *(information deleted--sgonzalez\cms).
